param.name: limit
param.label: Set limit
param.description: Limit the number of images to show

param.name: logo
param.label: Display Logo
param.description: Select whether or not to show the modflickr logo

param.name: flickrstyle
param.label: Use Flickr Module Stylesheet

param.name: slimbox
param.label: Use Slimbox
param.description: Select whether or not to use the slimbox overlay
